name: Fork Child
description:
A project made under 3 days by 4 nerds. Your mission is to traverse a level as fast as you can and get the lowest time possible. Use your fork gun to shoot forks at clocks to lower your time. 

Controls:

WASD to run

Space to jump

Hold shift to do a long jump (the longer you hold the further you jump)

Left click to shoot a fork

...Psst... Hey, I've heard one of the developers have 1,7 seconds on level 3... Try to beat it if you can...
